params.attack: Your attacks are multiversal, therefore nothing can block them, not even Superman.
params.defense: Your defense is multiversal, therefore nothing can stop you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Bad writers: Your attack and defense are lowered to basic after night 1 is over.
- Origin Story: You MUST use your overpowered attack n1.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Overpowered attack: Attack someone tonight. 1 use per night.
- Good writers: You may regain your OP multiversal stats for tonight only. You must use this during the day. 2 uses, cannot be used before night 3 passes.
